name: playwright-ts
description: playwright test framework for celigo ui/ux automation

scripts.test:visual: npm run storybook-build && npx playwright test --config=node_modules/@celigo/ui-test-automation/dist/visual.config.js --workers 3
scripts.updateSnapshots: npm run storybook-build && npx playwright test --config=node_modules/@celigo/ui-test-automation/dist/visual.config.js --update-snapshots
scripts.report: allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report && allure open allure-report

author: B Vinay Kumar
